div.span: Value Living Welcome to eaves San Dimas! A place where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality San Dimas apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and in-unit washer and dryers. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Simply put, our San Dimas apartments offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? San Dimas Apartments by eaves No matter where you call home, you deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably. At eaves San Dimas, that's exactly what you'll get. San Dimas is located in the heart of the San Gabriel Valley – 25 miles east of Los Angeles – and eaves San Dimas is only two blocks from Downtown San Dimas with convenient access to shopping, dining and recreation. Located on E. Bonita Avenue, our Los Angeles apartment community is conveniently located near 210, 10 and 57 freeways, along with the Metrolink line. There is no shortage of fun nearby either as the San Dimas Canyon Golf Course and Raging Waters are both close to our community. San Dimas is bursting with amazing restaurants as well, including Pinnacle Peak Steakhouse, Tortorelli's, Clayton Brewing Co and Sushi Cruise 2. San Dimas Apartment Community From the moment you become a part of our eaves San Dimas community, you’ll have access to a range of perks that make life more convenient and perfectly complements your lifestyle. For instance, any maintenance issues you face will be promptly dealt with, allowing you to focus on things that are more important to you in your life. Our on-site fitness center and sparkling swimming pool makes it possible for residents to maintain a healthy lifestyle at no extra cost. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in San Dimas today.

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: 2 beds • 1 bath • 923 sqft • Available Furnished (Contact Us)

Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

We offer quality San Dimas apartments with a few little extras, like well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances and in-unit washer and dryers. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Simply put, our San Dimas apartments offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? San Dimas Apartments by eaves No matter where you call home, you deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably. At eaves San Dimas, that's exactly what you'll get. San Dimas is located in the heart of the San Gabriel Valley – 25 miles east of Los Angeles – and eaves San Dimas is only two blocks from Downtown San Dimas with convenient access to shopping, dining and recreation. Located on E. Bonita Avenue, our Los Angeles apartment community is conveniently located near 210, 10 and 57 freeways, along with the Metrolink line. There is no shortage of fun nearby either as the San Dimas Canyon Golf Course and Raging Waters are both close to our community. San Dimas is bursting with amazing restaurants as well, including Pinnacle Peak Steakhouse, Tortorelli's, Clayton Brewing Co and Sushi Cruise 2. San Dimas Apartment Community From the moment you become a part of our eaves San Dimas community, you’ll have access to a range of perks that make life more convenient and perfectly complements your lifestyle. For instance, any maintenance issues you face will be promptly dealt with, allowing you to focus on things that are more important to you in your life. Our on-site fitness center and sparkling swimming pool makes it possible for residents to maintain a healthy lifestyle at no extra cost.
